title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9001.3 - Proof of identity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9001.3 - Proof of identity

State Regulations

When a request is made, the authority may require appropriate
identification, such as a driver's license, a photograph or similar information
that confirms the record sought pertains to the data subject; unless, the
record is accessible pursuant to the Freedom of Information

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9001.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
